Chen:Possession.NAME: Possession
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain
#yStrength and #yFocus. Upon taking unblocked damage, lose

Chen:ShikigamiBase.NAME: Shikigami
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, play

Chen:ShikigamiUpgraded.NAME: Shikigami
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, play

Chen:Deceitful.NAME: Deceitful
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you #yShapeshift each turn, apply

Chen:Sharpen.NAME: Sharpen
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply

Chen:Exploit.NAME: Exploit
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you attack an enemy with #yDisoriented, apply

Chen:Disoriented.NAME: Disoriented
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon taking unblocked damage, lose that much #yStrength until the end of the turn. Lose #b1 stack when triggered, and is halved at the end of the turn.

Chen:LoseFocusPower.NAME: Focus Down
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of this turn, lose

Chen:Self Control.NAME: Self Control
DESCRIPTIONS: You cannot #yShapeshift. When #yShapeshifting is prevented, draw

Chen:DamageUpPower.NAME: Increased Damage
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next attack this turn deals

Chen:Frivolous.NAME: Frivolous
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of
a random card in your hand by #b1.
random cards in your hand by #b1.

Chen:Copy.NAME: Copycat
DESCRIPTIONS: Put a copy of the next
card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.
cards you play this turn on top of your draw pile.

Chen:FollowUp.NAME: Follow Up
DESCRIPTIONS: time you play an Attack each turn draw a card and reduce its cost by #b1 until the end of the turn.
times you play an Attack each turn draw a card and reduce its cost by #b1 until the end of the turn.

Chen:FinalSpellCard.NAME: Final Spell Card
DESCRIPTIONS: additional time. All cards have #yEthereal and #yExhaust.
additional times. All cards have #yEthereal and #yExhaust.

Chen:Catseye.NAME: Catseye
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next attack does additional damage equal to the amount of #yHemorrhage the target has.
Your next attack does additional damage equal to
times the amount of #yHemorrhage the target has.

Chen:DivideAttack.NAME: Afterimages
DESCRIPTIONS: This enemy's attack is divided into more hits. But, you shouldn't be seeing this.

Chen:Stability.NAME: Stability
DESCRIPTIONS: Block is not removed at the start of your turn. Is removed upon #yShapeshifting.

Chen:Unbalanced.NAME: Unbalanced
DESCRIPTIONS: The next time you #yShapeshift, end your turn immediately.
